excellent.title: ðŸŽ‰ Excellent Accessibility Detected!
excellent.description: Your website shows outstanding accessibility compliance with no critical or serious issues found. The analysis detected minimal violations and your site appears to follow accessibility best practices.
excellent.noUpgradeNeeded: No detailed report upgrade needed - your accessibility is already in great shape!

issuePreview.getDetailedReport: Get the detailed report to see specific violations and how to fix them

upgradePrompt.title: Unlock Complete Analysis
upgradePrompt.description: Get the full detailed report with all violations, code examples, implementation guidance, and a professional PDF export.

lockedSection.title: Additional Features Locked
lockedSection.description: Detailed analysis, custom checks, performance metrics, and complete violation breakdown are available in the detailed report.

noResults.title: No Analysis Results Found
noResults.description: It looks like you haven't run an accessibility analysis yet, or the results have expired.

messages.noResultsFound: No analysis results found. Please run an analysis first.
messages.downloadAvailableInDetailed: Download is available in the detailed report. Click "Get Detailed Report & PDF" to upgrade.

noRecommendations.title: No Recommendations Available
noRecommendations.description: No specific recommendations were generated for this analysis.

noViolations.title: No Accessibility Violations Found
noViolations.description: Great! No accessibility violations were detected in the analysis.

axeViolations.color-contrast: Elements must meet minimum color contrast ratio thresholds
axeViolations.color-contrast-desc: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds
axeViolations.heading-order: Heading levels should only increase by one
axeViolations.heading-order-desc: Ensure the order of headings is semantically correct
axeViolations.meta-viewport: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled
axeViolations.meta-viewport-desc: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
axeViolations.region: All page content should be contained by landmarks
axeViolations.region-desc: Ensure all page content is contained by landmarks
axeViolations.tabindex: Elements should not have tabindex greater than zero
axeViolations.tabindex-desc: Ensure tabindex attribute values are not greater than 0
axeViolations.image-alt-desc: Ensure elements have alternate text or a role of none or presentation
axeViolations.label: Form elements must have labels
axeViolations.label-desc: Ensure every form element has a label
axeViolations.aria-allowed-attr-desc: Ensure ARIA attributes are allowed for an element's role
axeViolations.aria-required-attr: Required ARIA attributes must be provided
axeViolations.aria-required-attr-desc: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes

colorContrast.totalDescription: Elements that fail color contrast requirements
colorContrast.aaDescription: Elements below 4.5:1 contrast ratio (3:1 for large text)
colorContrast.aaaDescription: Elements below 7:1 contrast ratio (4.5:1 for large text)
colorContrast.complianceDescription: Percentage of elements meeting WCAG AA standards
colorContrast.contrastTooLow: Text contrast is too low for accessibility standards
colorContrast.howToFixWeb: Increase contrast between text and background colors to meet WCAG AA standards (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text).
colorContrast.quickTipDetails: Use your browser's developer tools to inspect elements and adjust CSS color values. Test changes with a contrast checker before publishing.
